TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/TaskbarClock extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains a class that provides a for the background of the taskbar clock. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TaskbarClock> class provides a foundation in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TaskbarClock.Time> class is defined. The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TaskbarClock.Time.Normal%2A> property of this class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for the background of the taskbar clock.
